body_html:
Any update on this issue? It does seem like the function has been written but somehow did not end up in the actual codebase!

For anyone looking to just use this function directly, here's a link: https://github.com/rdipietro/pytorch/blob/4c00324affb8c6d53d4362e321ea0e99ede6cfde/torch/nn/utils/rnn.py

For anyone looking to just use this function directly, here's a link: https://github.com/rdipietro/pytorch/blob/4c00324affb8c6d53d4362e321ea0e99ede6cfde/torch/nn/utils/rnn.py
